articles.author: Kylie Hemmert
articles.title: CS Review: Final Fantasy VII Remake Proves It Was Worth the Wait - ComingSoon.net
articles.description: The bottom line is, Final Fantasy VII Remake is absolutely worth the investment. The game is fun and addicting, and could not have been released at a better time.
articles.content: The best part about Square Enix’s reimagining of the classic Final Fantasy VII game is that you don’t have to be a player of the original, or any game of the franchise, to enjoy and appreciate the visually striking Final Fantasy VII Remake, thanks in part to … [+9433 chars]

articles.description: Former Barcelona forward Bojan Krkic believes that it is only a matter of time before his old team-mate Xavi ends up as head coach of the club, stating his belief that the Blaugrana are “destined” to welcome the Catalan icon back to Camp Nou.
